column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Came here on weekend in Chicago to get the deep dish experience. There was about a 40 min wait after we put our name down
column2: and they recommended we order our pizzas ahead of time. When we they were ready for us
column3: it was still prob about another 40 min before our pizzas came out. The menu also had wet pizza sauce on it which Â was a little unsettling. We had "The Lou" deep dish which was pretty good
column4: though tbh I'm not really a deep dish kinda guy. Food quality 4/5 Service/wait 2/5 Cleanliness 3/5.
